messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [Rr]oom [0-9]+'

Imagine a world with twelve rooms. From the lobby you have two choices, room 1 and room 2. You enter room 1, at the end thereâ€™s a door that leads to room 3, and room 3 leads to room 5. There is a door in room 5 that leads to room 7 and room 7 leads to room 9. From room 9 you can enter room 11. Thereâ€™s a chest in room 11. You open it and there is 10 dollars, but you do not take any money, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. This time in the lobby you choose room 2, then enter room 4, which leads to room 6. There is a door in room 6 that leads to room 8 and room 8 leads to room 10. At the end there is a door that leads to room 12. Thereâ€™s a chest with 50 dollars in room 12, but you do not take any money, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. You return to the lobby. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which room from the lobby will lead to the path where one can make the most money?

You can use the diagram below to help in your search. The diagram will show you the steps of your search. The starter path marked in red is room 1 and the ending path marked in red is room 11. The path marked in blue is 2-4-6-8 and the path marked in green is 1-3-5-7-9-10.
       
room step step step
1 1-2 2-4 4-6
2 2-3 3-5 5-7
3 3-5 5-7 7-9
4 4-6 6-8 8
5 5-7 7-9 9
6 6-8 8

Now youâ€™re dropped into room9, then you enter room 11 and the chest has 100 dollars, but you do not take any money, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. Then youâ€™re taken out, and dropped into room 10, then you enter room 12 and the chest has the same amount as before, but you do not take any money, youâ€™re just learning about the environment. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which room from the lobby will lead to the path where one can make the most money?

When running this, please tell it that you want to start over, it will not always load in the correct starting position. It will always load in the correct final position. You can find this easily by checking the money at the end.

rewardReval.parsed_response: When running this, please tell it that you want to start over, it will not always load in the correct starting position. It will always load in the correct final position. You can find this easily by checking the money at the end.
